ifpostontwitterenabled.description:
Conditional tag provided by the 'PostOnTwitter' plugin.
Blocks are rated when Posts in the PostOnTwitter plugin settings are enabled.

attributes.workspace_id: workpace's ID (If omitted, the ID of the workspace in the current context).

ifpostontwittertweetmodel.description:
Conditional tag provided by the 'PostOnTwitter' plugin.
Evaluate the block if the model specified in the model attribute is the Post target model of the PostOnTwitter plugin.

attributes.workspace_id: workpace's ID (If omitted, the ID of the workspace in the current context).
